mapper.select: SELECT A.CAMPNO ,A.CAMPNAME ,A.CAMPTYPE ,CASE WHEN A.CAMPTYPE = 10 THEN '세미나' WHEN A.CAMPTYPE = 20 THEN '뉴스레터' WHEN A.CAMPTYPE = 30 THEN '테스트' END AS CAMPTYPE_ ,A.CAMPSTEP ,CASE WHEN A.CAMPSTEP = 1 THEN '캠페인생성' WHEN A.CAMPSTEP = 2 THEN '고객추출' WHEN A.CAMPSTEP = 3 THEN '발송중' WHEN A.CAMPSTEP = 4 THEN '종료' END AS CAMPSTEP_ , DATE_FORMAT(A.STARTDATE,'%Y-%m-%d') AS STARTDATE , DATE_FORMAT(A.ENDDATE,'%Y-%m-%d') AS ENDDATE , CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(A.STARTDATE,'%Y-%m-%d') , ' ~ ' , DATE_FORMAT(A.ENDDATE,'%Y-%m-%d')) AS CAMPDATE_ ,A.OWNER ,(SELECT USERNAME FROM me800010 WHERE USERNO = A.OWNER) AS OWNER_ ,A.CAMPDESC ,A.FILESEARCHKEY FROM cp400010 A WHERE A.SITEID = #{siteid} AND A.CAMPNO = #{campno}
mapper.update: UPDATE cp400010 SET ISDELETE = '1' WHERE CAMPNO = #{campno}
mapper.select: SELECT A.NAME, CASE WHEN SUBSTRING(A.NAME,0,5) = 'addr' THEN A.VALUE ELSE C.CODENAME END AS CODENAME, A.VALUE FROM cp400020 A LEFT OUTER JOIN sys990020 B ON B.CODEVAL = CASE WHEN SUBSTRING(A.NAME,0,5) = 'addr' THEN SUBSTRING(A.NAME,0,6) ELSE A.NAME END AND B.CODEGRP = 'CAMP' LEFT OUTER JOIN sys990020 C ON C.CODEGRP = CASE WHEN SUBSTRING(A.NAME,0,5) = 'addr' THEN SUBSTRING(A.NAME,0,6) ELSE A.NAME END AND C.CODEVAL = A.VALUE WHERE A.CAMPNO = #{campno} AND A.SITEID = #{siteid}

SELECT A.NO ,A.CAMPNO ,A.SITEID ,A.SENDER ,A.SENDTYPE ,A.SENDFORM ,CASE WHEN A.SENDTYPE = 1 THEN '즉시발송' WHEN A.SENDTYPE = 2 THEN '예약발송' WHEN A.SENDTYPE = 3 THEN '요일발송' WHEN A.SENDTYPE = 4 THEN '기간발송' END AS SENDTYPE_ ,DATE_FORMAT(A.SENDDATE,'%Y-%m-%d') AS SENDDATE_ ,A.WEEK ,CASE WHEN A.WEEK = 1 THEN '1주차' WHEN A.WEEK = 2 THEN '2주차' WHEN A.WEEK = 3 THEN '3주차' WHEN A.WEEK = 4 THEN '4주차' WHEN A.WEEK = 5 THEN '5주차' END WEEK_ ,A.DAY ,CASE WHEN A.DAY = 1 THEN '일요일' WHEN A.DAY = 2 THEN '월요일' WHEN A.DAY = 3 THEN '화요일' WHEN A.DAY = 4 THEN '수요일' WHEN A.DAY = 5 THEN '목요일' WHEN A.DAY = 6 THEN '금요일' WHEN A.DAY = 7 THEN '토요일' END DAY_ ,DATE_FORMAT(A.STARTDATE,'%Y-%m-%d') AS STARTDATE_ ,DATE_FORMAT(A.ENDDATE,'%Y-%m-%d') AS ENDDATE_ ,A.SENDTIME ,A.TITLE ,A.SENDDESC ,A.TESTER ,A.CONTENTNO ,(SELECT TITLE FROM sys990050 WHERE CONTENTNO = A.CONTENTNO) AS CONTENTSNO_ , A.FILESEARCHKEY1 , A.FILESEARCHKEY2 , A.FILESEARCHKEY3 FROM cp400030 A WHERE SITEID = #{siteid} AND CAMPNO = #{campno} AND SENDFORM = #{sendform}
mapper.update: { call CAMP_SEND(#{siteid, mode=IN, jdbcType=INTEGER, javaType=int},#{userno, mode=IN, jdbcType=INTEGER, javaType=int},#{campno, mode=IN, jdbcType=INTEGER, javaType=int},#{sendform, mode=IN, jdbcType=INTEGER, javaType=int})}
mapper.select: SELECT B.CODENAME , IFNULL(C.CODENAME,A.VALUE) AS VALUE , A.CAMPORDER , DATE_FORMAT(A.REGDATE,'%Y-%m-%d') AS REGDATE FROM cp400022 A LEFT OUTER JOIN sys990020 B ON B.CODEVAL = CASE WHEN SUBSTRING(A.NAME,0,5) = 'addr' THEN SUBSTRING(A.NAME,0,6) ELSE A.NAME END AND B.CODEGRP = 'CAMP' LEFT OUTER JOIN sys990020 C ON C.CODEGRP = CASE WHEN SUBSTRING(A.NAME,0,5) = 'addr' THEN SUBSTRING(A.NAME,0,6) ELSE A.NAME END AND C.CODEVAL = A.VALUE WHERE A.SITEID = #{siteid} AND A.CAMPNO = #{campno}

SELECT A.CAMPNO AS id , A.CAMPNAME AS title , DATE_FORMAT(A.STARTDATE,'%Y-%m-%d') AS 'start' , DATE_FORMAT(A.ENDDATE,'%Y-%m-%d') AS 'end' , CASE WHEN E.SENDFORM = 1 THEN '#FF0000' WHEN E.SENDFORM = 2 THEN '#0040FF' WHEN E.SENDFORM = 3 THEN '#FF00FF' WHEN E.SENDFORM = 4 THEN '#FFFFFF' END AS 'color'
, CASE WHEN A.CAMPSTEP = 1 THEN '캠페인생성' WHEN A.CAMPSTEP = 2 THEN '대상추출' WHEN A.CAMPSTEP = 3 THEN '발송중' WHEN A.CAMPSTEP = 4 THEN '종료' END AS CAMPSTEP_
, (SELECT USERNAME FROM me800010 WHERE USERNO = A.OWNER) AS OWNER_
, IFNULL(B.CNT,0) AS CNT , IFNULL(C.CNT,0) AS CLICKCNT , CONCAT(IFNULL(C.CNT,0) , ' / ' ,IFNULL(B.CNT,0)) AS CLICKTOTAL , CONCAT(IFNULL(D.CNT,0) , ' / ' ,IFNULL(B.CNT,0)) AS SENDTOTAL
, CASE WHEN E.SENDFORM = 1 THEN 'EMAIL' WHEN E.SENDFORM = 2 THEN 'SMS' WHEN E.SENDFORM = 3 THEN 'LMS' WHEN E.SENDFORM = 4 THEN 'MMS' END AS SENDFORM_
FROM cp400010 A LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT CAMPNO,COUNT(EMAILLOGID) AS CNT FROM sys980010 GROUP BY CAMPNO) B ON B.CAMPNO = A.CAMPNO LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT CAMPNO,COUNT(EMAILLOGID) AS CNT FROM sys980010 WHERE CLICKYN = 0 AND CAMPNO IS NOT NULL GROUP BY CAMPNO) C ON C.CAMPNO = A.CAMPNO LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT CAMPNO,COUNT(EMAILLOGID) AS CNT FROM sys980010 WHERE RLTCODE = 20 AND CAMPNO IS NOT NULL GROUP BY CAMPNO) D ON C.CAMPNO = A.CAMPNO LEFT OUTER JOIN cp400030 E ON E.CAMPNO = A.CAMPNO WHERE A.SITEID = #{siteid} AND A.ISDELETE = #{isdelete} AND A.CAMPSTEP IN (3,4)
SELECT CAMPNO,COUNT(EMAILLOGID) FROM T_MAIL GROUP BY CAMPNO
